title: MAG 048 - Lost In The Crowd - Transcript Re-formatted
text:
JONATHAN SIMS 
Well, that’s just not true. 
 
ELIAS 

The Magnus Archives – MAG048 – Lost in The Crowd 
14 
 
Well, what matters is that your team thinks that it could be. Look, I... I know 
finding Gertrude’s body hit you hard. I understand, but you need to leave this 
alone. It isn’t their mental health that’s under scrutiny right now. 
 
JONATHAN SIMS 
Fine, fine… is that all? 
 
ELIAS 
Yes. 
 
[CLICK] 
 
JONATHAN SIMS 
I need to be more careful about the others noticing my investigations, 
especially if I’ve further cause to watch their homes. More importantly though, 
I think Elias just moved to the top of my suspect list. I wonder what he’s 
hiding? 
 
End supplement. 
 
[CLICK] 
 

The Magnus Archives – MAG048 – Lost in The Crowd 
15 
 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro]
